SEARCH
Package controller.db

Interface ProductDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcProductDao
public interface ProductDao
The ProductDao interface provides methods for interacting with the database regarding products and ingredients. It includes methods for saving, updating, deleting, and finding products and ingredients.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Method Details

    • saveProduct

      void saveProduct(Product product) throws SQLException
      Saves a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The Product object to be saved.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • saveProductIngredient

      void saveProductIngredient(int ingredientId, int productId, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Saves an ingredient associated with a product to the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - The ID of the ingredient to be saved.
      productId - The ID of the product to which the ingredient is associated.
      conn - The database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • saveIngredient

      void saveIngredient(Ingredient ingredient, int productId, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Saves an ingredient for a specific product to the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The Ingredient object to be saved.
      productId - The ID of the product associated with the ingredient.
      conn - The database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • saveIngredientAlergen

      void saveIngredientAlergen(int ingredientId, int alergen, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Saves an allergen associated with an ingredient to the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - The ID of the ingredient associated with the allergen.
      alergen - The allergen to be saved.
      conn - The database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

      Parameters:
      alergen - The new allergen name.
      id - The ID of the allergen to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findProductById

      Product findProductById(int id) throws SQLException
      Finds a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to be found.
      Returns:
      The Product object with the specified ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findIngredientsById

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to be found.
      Returns:
      The Ingredient object with the specified ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findIngredientsByName

      Ingredient findIngredientsByName(String name, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Finds an ingredient by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to be found.
      conn - The database connection.
      Returns:
      The Ingredient object with the specified name, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findAlergensByName

      String findAlergensByName(String name, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Finds allergens associated with an ingredient by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient.
      conn - The database connection.
      Returns:
      A string representation of allergens associated with the ingredient.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findIngredientsByProduct

      List<Ingredient> findIngredientsByProduct(int id) throws SQLException
      Finds all ingredients associated with a specific product.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product whose ingredients are to be found.
      Returns:
      A list of Ingredient objects associated with the product.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findAlergensByIngredient

      List<String> findAlergensByIngredient(Ingredient ingredient) throws SQLException
      Finds allergens associated with a specific ingredient.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The Ingredient object whose allergens are to be found.
      Returns:
      A list of allergen names associated with the ingredient.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findAll

      List<Product> findAll() throws SQLException
      Finds all products in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Product objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.
